NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 OENO: Yes, yes... You're so close..! 2 1 OENO: No! It scampered off again... 3 2 OENO: You saw the vision orb move up slightly, didn't you, Coleus? Neither of us were looking directly at the orb! 4 3 OENO: I have been adjusting our vision orbs to accomodate the native lifeforms' vision to allow them to use them. I am hopeful they will learn to use it soon! 5 4 COLEUS: I wish I could credit their eyes, Oeno - but I'm afraid it was simply the Attlerock's gravity tugging the vision orb upwards as it orbited overhead! 6 5 OENO: Was the Attlerock orbiting overhead just now? Oh, how maddening! 7 6 CYCAD: I knew you were playing with the native lifeforms again, Oeno! Yarrow was looking for you earlier. 8 7 OENO: Of course! It's lovely seeing these lifeforms becoming more curious as they grow more comfortable with our presence. 9 8 OENO: What matter did Yarrow need my help with, Cycad? 10 9 CYCAD: According to Yarrow, the Sun Station crew reported that their warp tower's rotating doors have been opening and closing by themselves, without any sort of input. 11 10 CYCAD: When Yarrow went to check on the issue, he noticed the same thing happening at Timber Hearth's warp tower as well! 12 11 OENO: How strange.. 13 12 OENO: My thanks for delivering this message, Cycad. I shall travel to Ash Twin to catch up with Yarrow and investigate this issue as soon as I can! TH_WR R1 11 Campsite EX2 6 TH_WR EX4 9
